alert.note: Alert for Bryan; Bulloch (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 20 at 7:41PM EDT until May 20 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BRYAN...EVANS AND BULLOCH COUNTIES... At 741 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Denmark to near Nevils to near Daisy, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Statesboro, Daisy, Denmark, Nevils, Groveland and Bay. This warning includes I-16 between mile markers 118 and 134. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
